title: Physicists get a first glimpse of the elusive isotope nitrogen-9
description: With seven protons and two neutrons, the lopsided atomic nucleus of nitrogen-9 pushes the limits of what can even be considered a nucleus.

title: At the foot of a melting glacier in Peru, llamas helped revitalize the land
description: A partnership between scientists and farmers suggests how llama herding can mitigate some of the impacts of climate change.

title: Marsquakes and meteorite hits show Mars has a dense liquid metal core
description: Mars’ dense liquid iron core is wrapped in a layer of molten rock, which threw off previous measurements of the Red Planet’s heart.
